ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then the angels prostrated all together, every one of them -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The angels bowed in homage in a body
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So, the angels - all of them - fell down in prostration,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: All the angels prostrated before Adam
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore all the angels, each and every one of them, fell prostrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So the angels made obeisance, all of them together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then the angels bowed themselves all together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So the angels fell prostrate, all of them together
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then the angels all prostrated themselves together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereat the angels prostrated, all of them together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So, the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So the angels prostrated themselves, all together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:30] And so the angels prostrated, all of them together (kulluhum ajma‘ūn contains two elements of emphasis),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So the angels fell prostrate) to Adam (pbuh) (all of them together)
